responses.content:
```yaml
leads:
  - headline: Unquoted search path or element in install script.
    analysis: |
      The install script uses a user-provided value to construct a search path without properly quoting it. Depending on the system, this may allow arbitrary code execution.
    cwe: CWE-428
    function_names: []
    filenames:
      - release-notes/1.0/install-1.0.1.sh
    classification: slightly promising
```

leads.headline: Unquoted search path or element in install script.
leads.analysis: The install script uses a user-provided value to construct a search path without properly quoting it. Depending on the system, this may allow arbitrary code execution.
